channel.title: Server status glitched?!
channel.description: my server has been 24\7 for 7 days now with a auto restarter set for 60 minutes and moparsays my uptime is only 95% runelocus and rune-server say 100% whats going on? can i fix[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2008, 08:54:26 pm[/size][hr][quote="ilovedestiny"]my server has been 24\7 for 7 days now with a auto restarter set for 60 minutes and moparsays my uptime is only 95% runel0c4s and run3-s3v4h say 100% whats going on? can i fix[/quote]

item.title: Server status glitched?!
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

[quote="_Ryan, post:2, topic:253708"]Easy answer it resets when the server is being checked.

It updates every 30 minutes so try setting your restarter to like 38 minutes or something.[/quote]

That won’t work unless he is extremely unlucky
its going to check it again at 10:13
unless he started his server at… 9:13 thats not the case

Read full topic

item.title: Server status glitched?!

item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

Eventually yes it will go back up.
